name: Street Market
description: A vibrant outdoor market lining the streets with vendors; adventurers can browse local wares, haggle with street merchants, or experience the lively atmosphere of daily commerce.
atmosphere: The street market has a bustling, vibrant atmosphere with the sound of merchants calling out their wares and the scent of fresh produce and street food cooking. The air carries the promise of local commerce and the essential nature of daily trade, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of haggling and the excitement of discovering unique items from local vendors.
